About Me

I’m Philip, a first-year medical student. This website is a work in progress - check back for more later.


Research Experience

Interests

I am broadly interested in exploring applications of statistics to medicine and public health. I’m not afraid to learn languages, but I prefer using Python.
I like to automate things and minimize hassle.
